participant_1.background:
I try to avoid my sister-in-law in the morning so that I can focus on my family and business.
I'm not as happy as I look, but my parents think I have everything I could ever want.
I enjoy baking for my nieces and nephews.
I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection.
I remember falling asleep in the back of my dad's pickup truck on the way to the beach.

participant_2.background:
I got fired from my job for speaking my mind too much.
i love going to concerts and dancing hard.
I took medication to help with my dust allergy so I could write my book.
I'm a young person who doesn't want to continue my family's business.
i love creating new recipes.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing well. What are you up to today?
I'm writing a book right now!
Nice! What's it about?
It's about a young person who doesn't want to continue their family's business. I took medication to help with my dust allergy so I could write it.
Oh wow, that sounds really interesting! How is that going so far?
It's going really well, I'm almost done! I just need to figure out how to end it.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll figure it out.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love going to concerts and dancing hard! It's so much fun to let loose and have a good time.
Oh yeah, I love concerts too! I've been to a few recently, they're always so much fun.
I know, right? They're the best!
So, what's your favorite band?
I have a lot of favorites, but I think my favorite right now is The Killers.
Oh yeah, they're great! I love their music.
Me too! I've seen them in concert a few times, they're amazing live.
I've always wanted to see them live, they're on my bucket list.
You should definitely go see them if you get the chance, they're an amazing show.
I will, thanks for the recommendation!
No problem
